description.en:
An experimental machine, this module can broadcast messages shipwide easily to any room needed, though it needs a constant supply of coal to keep powered. Created by David Dire, unbroken by Cataclysm


STATS:

Weight: 175
HP: 300
Provides 22 Command
Requires A Unit Of Coal Every 30 Seconds
Operators: 3 Crew Members
Recommended Crew: 4
